pages.text: $(li)The Sharpness enchantment can be applied in any kind of Sword, Axe, Pickarang or Flamarang.$(br)$(li)This enchantment increase the damage inflicted of your enemies.
pages.title: Sharpness

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level IV.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level V of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Sharpness).
